article_title: Former Arizona Gov. Jan Brewer endorses Donald Trum
article_text:
Former Arizona Gov. Jan Brewer endorses Donald Trum

Photo: Ross D. Franklin / Associated Press Arizona Gov. Jan Brewer vetoed a bill supporting people who refuse...

Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump won the endorsement on Saturday of former Arizona governor Jan Brewer, whose hardline positions on immigration reform and tussles with President Barack Obama catapulted her to national prominence during her two terms in office.

article_metadata.author.name: Jose A. DelRea, The Washington Post
